title: X Factor's Amelia Lily 'set to join Geordie Shore' as bosses hope she will make series 'explosive'
text:
She rose to fame on The X Factor in the same year Little Mix were crowned winners, before enjoying a successful stint on Celebrity Big Brother in 2017.

And Amelia Lily, 25, is reportedly set to join Geordie Shore, with filming for the 21st series set to start later this week.

A source told The Sun: 'Bosses are made up they've signed Amelia for the show and promise she will make it the best series yet, she's always up for a laugh and will make great telly for viewers.

Time to party: X Factor's Amelia Lily, 25, is reportedly set to join Geordie Shore, with filming for the 21st series set to start later this week (pictured last year)

'Amelia's not shy about saying what she thinks either so things could get explosive.'

And judging by Amelia's Instagram she could prove the perfect fit for the Geordie Shore crew.

The songstress litters her page with snaps of her looking glamorous and enjoying a cocktail or two.

MailOnline has contacted Amelia's representatives and MTV for further comment.

Geordie Shore veteran Chloe Ferry meanwhile has finally called it quits on her relationship with Sam Gowland for good following their turbulent romance.

Reality stars: Amelia will reportedly join the Geordie Shore cast and film with Beau Brennan, Bethan Kershaw, Nathan Henry, Chloe Ferry and Natalie Phillips (L-R)later this week

Singer: Amelia rose to fame on The X Factor in the same year Little Mix were crowned winners, before enjoying a successful stint on Celebrity Big Brother in 2017 (pictured 2012)

A source said: 'Bosses are made up they've signed Amelia for the show and promise she will make it the best series yet' (pictured June)

The couple went public with their romance in October 2017 but split in May earlier this year after she accused him of cheating with Love Island beauty Amber Davies, something she vehemently denied.

And an insider told the publication that Chloe, 24 , has returned to the show without Sam, also 24.

'Chloe has completely wiped her hands of Sam and she wants him out of her life for good, during the last series Sam kept chopping in and out of the show and it left Chloe in a really bad place.'

'Explosive': Judging by Amelia's Instagram she could prove the perfect fit for the Geordie Shore crew. The singer litters her page with glamorous snaps from nights out (pictured July)

The source added Sam was 'given the shove because of the chaos', while a different source told the publication that he wasn't part of the show at present but that 'doesn't mean he won't return'.

MailOnline has contacted Sam's representatives for comment.

Their relationship came crashing to an end when she dumped him after accusing him of cheating with Love Island beauty Amber, which she denies.

Things turned bitter between the pair when Chloe took to Instagram to accuse him of having sex with Amber, which they both sternly denied.

The star shared alleged messages between her ex Sam and Amber which she claims proves they had sex, despite the pair's denials.

Amber then took to Instagram to deny sleeping with Sam, and gave an explanation for the messages shared.
description: Amelia Lily, 25, is reportedly set to join Geordie Shore, with filming for the 21st series set to start later this week.
